Title: Arts and Crafts and Baths
Description:
Our arts and crafts activities today have gotten well out of hand. One of the whelps enchanted their brush and the rest followed suit. Now there is a coat of paint over everything.

Please clean up the daycare while we get the paint off the whelps.
ObjectivesText: Help clean up paint around the Little Scales Daycare.
PortraitGiverText: The whelps have conjured something with their paint. Something... sticky.
CompletionText: This paint was supposed to be washable, but it sticks to whelp scales like nothing else.
RewardText:
You came by just in time, $n. Thank you. This was a three-person job.

Now to reprimand Sir Pringly for indulging the whelps' poor behavior...
